description: Google+ enhancements with 5 (optionally enabled) modules:  – 1) User Mute - Mutes all posts by specific users. 2) Default Circle – Set a circle as default (instead of Stream). 3) Hide Images – Hide image: original and all shares. 4) Hide Comments – Hide comments (option hide all by default). 5) Search With Google – Search Google+ w/ Google Search.
name: Golden View for Google+
